name: UselessFactoftheDay
0: ”Alexa, open useless fact of the day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: useless fact of the day
des: If you love to learn things you never knew you needed to know, if you soak up information to show off at a quiz, or if you just like to learn random things then this skill is for you. Just ask Alexa to open useless fact of the day and she will educate you in a fact. Most facts are interesting. No fact are actually useful.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
